thread.title: Arlanda Airport gives you an immersive weather preview before you fly (VIDEO)
thread.title_full: Arlanda Airport gives you an immersive weather preview before you fly (VIDEO)

title: Arlanda Airport gives you an immersive weather preview before you fly (VIDEO)
text:
Arlanda Airport gives you an immersive weather preview before you fly (VIDEO) Friday July 3, 2015 Print Article 
STOCKHOLM, July 3 — Stockholm’s largest airport now has the perfect room for you to kill time while waiting for your flight. Say hello to the “climate portal”, which stimulates weather conditions at the destination of your choice. 
What does it do? It compiles current weather observations from selected cities and then stimulates the climate you can expect there. Whether it’s dry desert weather or chilly mornings, you’ll get to feel it while you’re still waiting for your flight. 
It’ll only be around until the end of August, though, so if you’re lucky enough to be passing through Stockholm Airport, give it a whirl. Immerse yourself in the weather you'll expect before you travel at Arlanda. — YouTube screencap More Stories for You:
